translations: 把……砍首（behead 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: They're dreadfully fond of beheading people here; the great wonder is, that there's any one left alive!
sentences.translation: 这里的人太喜欢砍头了；很奇怪的是，居然还有人活着！

sentences.sentence: He was scheduled to be publicly executed last Friday, but his beheading was deferred.
sentences.translation: 他原定于上周五就要被公开处决，但他被斩首推迟执行了。

sentences.sentence: On the first day of the conference there were eight murders across the bridge in juarez, including one beheading.
sentences.translation: 会议的第一天，在桥另一面的华雷斯城发生了8起谋杀案，其中有一起斩首案。
